class proposals.forms.ProposalForm(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: braces.forms.UserKwargModelFormMixin, core.forms.mixins.SoftValidationMixin, core.forms.conditional_form.ConditionalModelForm

__init__(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶
  • Remove empty label from relation field
  • Make sure all non-revision/non-amendment studies have an unique name
  • Don’t allow to pick yourself or a superuser as supervisor, unless you already are
  • Add a None-option for supervisor
  • Don’t allow to pick a superuser as applicant
  • If this is a practice Proposal, limit the relation choices
  • Remove summary for preliminary assessment Proposals
  • Set pre_assessment_pdf required for preliminary assessment Proposals, otherwise remove
clean()[source]¶

Check for conditional requirements: - If relation needs supervisor, make sure supervisor is set - If other_applicants is checked, make sure applicants are set - If other_stakeholders is checked, make sure stakeholders is not empty - Maximum number of words for summary - If this is a pre approved proposal, make sure people say yes to that question - If this is a pre approved proposal, make sure people fill in the correct fields - Make sure the user is listed in applicants

class proposals.forms.ProposalSubmitForm(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: django.forms.models.ModelForm

__init__(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶
  • Mark the label of inform_local_staff as safe
  • Check if the inform_local_staff question should be asked
clean()[source]¶

Check if the Proposal is complete: - Do all Studies have informed consent/briefing? - If the inform_local_staff question is asked, it is required

Bases: django.forms.models.ModelForm

__init__(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶
  • Set the Proposal for later reference
  • Set initial data for the study_name fields
clean()[source]¶

Check for conditional requirements: - If studies_similar is not set, add a required error - If studies_similar is set to False, make sure studies_number is set (and higher than 2) - If studies_number is set, make sure the corresponding name fields are filled.

class proposals.forms.WmoForm(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: core.forms.mixins.SoftValidationMixin, core.forms.conditional_form.ConditionalModelForm

__init__(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶
  • Remove empty label from is_medical/is_behavioristic field and reset the choices
clean()[source]¶

Check for conditional requirements: - If metc is checked, make sure institution is set and details are filled out - If metc is not checked, check if is_medical or is_behavioristic is set
